description:
This service overrides the operational flags for a sentinel device.

This should never be used in production environments. This is used to mimick offline scenario's in sentinel deployments in the cloud.

DisableCheckTask.description: Disable the automatic task that checks for Internet/EVACloud. This should be set to true if these properties need to be managed by hand.

EVACloudAvailable.description: Flag this environment as if the cloud deployment of EVA is not availabled. Will disable a lot of functionality.

InternetAvailable.description: Flag this environment as if it has no working internet connection. Will disable a lot of functionality.

RunningAsSentinel.description: Flag this environment as if it's running on a sentinel device. Will disable a lot of functionality.
